title: Lady Gaga: Chart Analysis
text:
Lady Gaga (Stefani Germanotta) is an American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her bold fashion, powerful vocals, and hits like “Poker Face” and “Bad Romance”. She gained fame with The Fame (2008) and has since released albums across pop, jazz, and electronic genres. Gaga is also an Oscar-winning actress, celebrated for her role in A Star Is Born (2018).

Total Weeks on Chart per Song
This bar chart shows the total number of weeks each song by Lady Gaga spent on the Billboard Hot 100.









Just Dance stayed in the charts the longest time,50 weeks.


Best Peak Rank per Song
This chart displays the highest (peak) Billboard Hot 100 position that each of Lady Gaga’s songs achieved.









The highest rank song is Born this way


Number of Chart Entries per Year
This bar chart displays the number of unique songs by Lady Gaga that entered the Billboard Hot 100 chart each year.






The most popular time coincides with the year 2009

title: Billboard Charts Analysis
text:
The Billboard Hot 100 is the music industry standard record chart in the United States for songs, published weekly by Billboard magazine. Chart rankings are based on sales, radio play, and online streaming in the United States.
Every week, Billboard releases “The Hot 100” chart of songs that were trending on sales and airplay for that week. This dataset is a collection of all “The Hot 100” charts released since its inception in 1958.

Top 3 Songs by Weeks on Chart
This plot presents the top 3 songs ranked by the number of weeks they remained on the chart. Each song is likely represented as a bar (if it’s a bar chart), with the length or height of the bar corresponding to the total number of weeks the song stayed on the chart.









The Weeknd’s Blinding Light stayed in the charts the longest time,10 weeks.



Rank Distribution for Top 5 Artists
This plot illustrates the rank distribution of songs for the top 5 artists. It highlights the relative success of each artist’s songs across different chart positions.











Rank Distribution of Top 10 Artists
This plot illustrates the rank distribution of songs for the top 10 artists. It highlights the relative success of each artist’s songs across different chart positions.

title: Billie Eilish: Chart Analysis
text:
Billie Eilish is an American singer, songwriter, and performer known for her unique sound, dark aesthetic, and emotionally raw lyrics. She rose to fame in 2015 at the age of 13 with her breakout song “Ocean Eyes,” which she released on SoundCloud and which quickly went viral. Her full name is Billie Eilish Pirate Baird O’Connell, and she was born on December 18, 2001, in Los Angeles, California.

Billie Eilish: Song Rank Over Time
This plot visualizes the performance of Billie Eilish’s songs on the Billboard Hot 100 over time.






The highest rank song is Bad Guy 



Billie Eilish: Heatmap of Songs Over Time
This heatmap visualizes the Billboard chart activity of Billie Eilish’s songs week by week over time.









The most popular time coincides with the year 2019-2020



Billie Eilish: Total Weeks on Chart by Song
This bar chart displays how many total weeks each Billie Eilish song spent on the Billboard Hot 100 chart.

title: The Weeknd: Chart Performance Analysis
text:
The Weeknd (Abel Tesfaye) is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and producer known for his distinctive voice and genre-blending music. He gained fame with his 2011 mixtapes House of Balloons and later global hits like “Can’t Feel My Face”, “Blinding Lights”, and “Starboy”. His music blends R&B, pop, and synthwave, and he’s known for his enigmatic persona and immersive performances.

The Weeknd: Song Rank Over Time
This plot visualizes the performance of The Weeknd’s songs on the Billboard Hot 100 over time.






The highest rank song is The Hills,Can’t Feel My Face,Hearthless,Blinding Light’s


The Weeknd: Rank Distribution by Song
This plot visualizes the distribution of chart rankings for each song by The Weeknd on the Billboard Hot 100 throughout its time on the chart.

title: About
text:
1 Introduction
On this site, an analysis of the Billboard charts was conducted using historical data.
The results of the study are presented through clear and informative graphs, highlighting trends and changes over time.


2 Results
The graphs below illustrate key findings of the analysis.
They help trace the evolution of musical preferences, as well as the popularity of different genres and artists over time.


3 Conclusion
This analysis provided valuable insights into the development of the music industry and listener preferences, based on Billboard chart data.


4 Sources
The main source was the Billboard charts database, which was publicly available, and ChatGpt was also used to create charts and analyze the database.
Dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/dhruvildave/billboard-the-hot-100-songs
